title: Arthur Allen, Author at KFF Health News - Page 3 of 4
author: Arthur Allen
text:
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/medicare-ruling-aduhelm-controversial-alzheimer-drug-critics/) [Inside the Tactical Tug of War Over the Controversial Alzheimer’s Drug](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/medicare-ruling-aduhelm-controversial-alzheimer-drug-critics/)
An epic battle is playing out behind the scenes over whether the government should pay for Aduhelm, an FDA-approved Alzheimer’s drug that scientists say has not been proven to work.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/los-angeles-county-schools-vaccine-mandates-measles-covid/) [How LA, Calling the Shots on School Vaccine Mandates, Can Lead the Way on Covid Rules](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/los-angeles-county-schools-vaccine-mandates-measles-covid/)
In the middle of a measles outbreak in 1977, the Los Angeles school system required students to be inoculated or stay out of class. Other school systems followed the practice. Will it work again now that the county is insisting that teens have their shots against covid?
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/surprise-bill-travel-insurance/) [Stranded by the Pandemic, He Had Only Travel Insurance. It Left Him With a $38,000 Bill.](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/surprise-bill-travel-insurance/)
Although it’s possible to buy travel insurance that provides some health coverage, the devil is in the fine print. Obama-era laws that prevent refusal of payment for preexisting conditions don’t apply to travel insurance.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/ser-inmune-a-covid-por-haberlo-tenido-o-estar-vacunado-es-lo-mismo/) [Ser inmune a covid por haberlo tenido o estar vacunado, ¿es lo mismo?](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/ser-inmune-a-covid-por-haberlo-tenido-o-estar-vacunado-es-lo-mismo/)
Hay pruebas de que contraer SARS-CoV-2 genera inmunidad. Pero muchos científicos creen que no son contundentes.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/covid-immunity-through-infection-or-vaccination-are-they-equal/) [Covid Immunity Through Infection or Vaccination: Are They Equal?](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/covid-immunity-through-infection-or-vaccination-are-they-equal/)
As scientists argue whether a previous bout of covid offers the same amount of protection as vaccinations, people turn to the courts to decide.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/how-fauci-and-the-nih-got-ahead-of-the-fda-and-cdc-in-backing-boosters/) [How Fauci and the NIH Got Ahead of the FDA and CDC in Backing Boosters](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/how-fauci-and-the-nih-got-ahead-of-the-fda-and-cdc-in-backing-boosters/)
With real-time data streaming in from highly specialized researchers in the U.S. and abroad, NIH scientists became convinced that boosting the covid-19 vaccine was needed to save lives, prompting the president to announce a plan with a Sept. 20 start date. Scientists at the regulatory agencies weren’t yet convinced. A meeting Friday will determine what happens next. Here’s the story from behind the scenes.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/federal-vaccine-program-hasnt-helped-those-whose-lives-were-altered-by-covid-shot/) [Federal Vaccine Program Hasn’t Helped Those Whose Lives Were Altered by Covid Shot](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/federal-vaccine-program-hasnt-helped-those-whose-lives-were-altered-by-covid-shot/)
A national vaccine court has paid out billions to families who could prove their kids were injured by vaccines. But there’s only a skeletal program for the rare victims of covid vaccination, raising concerns as the pressure for mandated shots grows.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/covid-vaccination-children-rare-side-effects-myocarditis-experts-caution/) [Not All Experts Are Ready to Vaccinate Kids Against Covid](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/covid-vaccination-children-rare-side-effects-myocarditis-experts-caution/)
Rare reports of minor heart damage have convinced some scientists that further study is needed before racing to extend covid shots to more children.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/analysis-mounting-pressure-on-china-about-covid-lab-leak-could-backfire/) [Analysis: Mounting Pressure on China About Covid ‘Lab Leak’ Could Backfire](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/analysis-mounting-pressure-on-china-about-covid-lab-leak-could-backfire/)
Where the coronavirus originated remains a mystery and the Chinese are bucking demands to let investigators see more.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/viaje-a-la-cueva-de-los-murcielagos-mientras-buscan-el-origen-de-covid-cientificos-reavivan-el-debate-sobre-la-fuga-de-laboratorio-de-wuhan/) [Viaje a la cueva de los murciélagos: mientras buscan el origen de covid, científicos reavivan el debate sobre la “fuga de laboratorio” de Wuhan](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/viaje-a-la-cueva-de-los-murcielagos-mientras-buscan-el-origen-de-covid-cientificos-reavivan-el-debate-sobre-la-fuga-de-laboratorio-de-wuhan/)
La idea de que el virus que causa covid escapó de un laboratorio chino, una teoría que en su momento se consideró conspirativa, está cobrando fuerza. Al mismo tiempo, peligra la reputación de renombrados científicos, al igual que su seguridad personal.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/wuhan-lab-leak-coronavirus-virologists-seek-inquiry-covid-origins-bat-research/) [To the Bat Cave: In Search of Covid’s Origins, Scientists Reignite Polarizing Debate on Wuhan ‘Lab Leak’](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/wuhan-lab-leak-coronavirus-virologists-seek-inquiry-covid-origins-bat-research/)
Leading virologists, including Dr. Anthony Fauci, are demanding a deeper probe into China’s Wuhan Institute of Virology as they try to identify the source of the deadly coronavirus.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/covid-vaccines-patent-waiver-biolyse-canadian-drugmaker-wants-to-make-johnson-johnson-vaccines-for-poor-countries/) [This Small Canadian Drugmaker Wants to Make J&J Vaccines for Poor Nations. It Needs More Than a Patent Waiver.](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/covid-vaccines-patent-waiver-biolyse-canadian-drugmaker-wants-to-make-johnson-johnson-vaccines-for-poor-countries/)
All agree that covid vaccines are urgently needed to stop the pandemic, but simply waiving patents fails to provide technological know-how and address supply chain challenges.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/no-hay-que-sufrir-efectos-secundarios-con-la-vacuna-contra-covid-para-estar-protegido/) [No hay que sufrir efectos secundarios con la vacuna contra covid para estar protegido](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/no-hay-que-sufrir-efectos-secundarios-con-la-vacuna-contra-covid-para-estar-protegido/)
Si bien los síntomas muestran que el sistema inmune está respondiendo a la vacuna y que protegerá contra la enfermedad, las personas con pocos o ningún síntoma también estaban protegidas.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/covid-vaccination-side-effects-suffering-effectiveness-smallpox/) [You Don’t Have to Suffer to Benefit From Covid Vaccination — But Some Prefer It](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/covid-vaccination-side-effects-suffering-effectiveness-smallpox/)
In the times of smallpox, vaccination was accompanied by blood, sweat, fire and brimstone. Nowadays, a slight fever may make you feel as if you’ve earned the reward of immunity from covid. But you’re protected even without a nasty reaction to the vaccine.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/el-caso-de-la-donacion-de-vacunas-contra-covid-estadounidenses-al-extranjero/) [El caso de la donación de vacunas contra covid estadounidenses al extranjero](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/el-caso-de-la-donacion-de-vacunas-contra-covid-estadounidenses-al-extranjero/)
Expertos felicitan las acciones de la administración Biden con las vacunas de covid, pero creen que en los próximos meses debería haber un enfoque global para que el mundo esté innmunizado.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/the-case-for-donating-us-covid-vaccines-overseas/) [The Case for Donating US Covid Vaccines Overseas](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/the-case-for-donating-us-covid-vaccines-overseas/)
For now, there’s not enough vaccine for the U.S., but that could change within a few months. Vaccinating other nations will be key to stopping the pandemic – and keeping it away from our shores.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/to-extract-more-doses-per-vial-vaccinators-put-squeeze-on-fda-to-relax-vaccine-handling-advice/) [To Extract More Doses per Vial, Vaccinators Put Squeeze on FDA to Relax Vaccine Handling Advice](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/to-extract-more-doses-per-vial-vaccinators-put-squeeze-on-fda-to-relax-vaccine-handling-advice/)
Although vaccine supply is ramping up, the supply gap puts pressure on vaccinating teams to extract every drop they can. Some are asking the FDA to waive guidance against extracting vaccine from two vials with the same needle. It’s worth a shot.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/explained-by-khn-consumer-concerns-about-the-covid-vaccines/) [‘Explained by KHN’: Consumer Concerns About the Covid Vaccines](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/explained-by-khn-consumer-concerns-about-the-covid-vaccines/)
Our newsroom has some of the best and smartest health care and health policy reporters in the business. We’ve created a new video series — “Explained by KHN” — in which our correspondents and editors answer common health care and policy questions. In this edition we cover consumer concerns over the covid-19 vaccines.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/after-billions-of-dollars-and-dozens-of-wartime-declarations-why-are-vaccines-still-in-short-supply/) [After Billions of Dollars and Dozens of Wartime Declarations, Why Are Vaccines Still in Short Supply?](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/article/after-billions-of-dollars-and-dozens-of-wartime-declarations-why-are-vaccines-still-in-short-supply/)
The Trump and Biden administrations both imposed wartime production requirements. But industry experts say the vast quantities of raw materials and specialty equipment needed for billions of newfangled vaccines have required herculean logistical efforts.
[](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/no-importa-cual-te-toque-cuando-tengas-oportunidad-vacunate-contra-covid/) [No importa cuál te toque. Cuando tengas oportunidad, vacúnate contra covid](https://kffhealthnews.org/news/no-importa-cual-te-toque-cuando-tengas-oportunidad-vacunate-contra-covid/)
Expertos afirman que debes ponerte la primera vacuna autorizada que te ofrezcan. ya que es la forma de comenzar a generar inmunidad colectiva.
